## Project Monitoring and Evaluation Services

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Solicitation Number
S24-20230704

### Tender Closing Date
August 25, 2023, at 14:00:00

### Contracting Entity
Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada (SSHRC)

### Location
National Capital Region (NCR), ON, Canada

### Trade Agreements
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Objectives
The Research Partnership Program (RPP) leadership and others responsible for the Connection Grant (CG) funding opportunity (FO) require credible evidence to inform potential improvements to this FO. The evaluation aims to examine CG's relevance and outcomes within the current environment and provide recommendations for ways that program management can improve CG's relevance and outcomes.

### Scope of Work
The evaluation will be conducted per the requirements of the Treasury Board Policy on Results and section 42.1 of the Financial Administration Act (FAA). The successful bidder will provide expert services to evaluate the CG FO, including but not limited to, assessing its relevance, outcomes, and overall effectiveness.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Contact Information
Tamara Bennett, tenders@nserc-crsng.gc.ca, (343) 563-1961
